name: Great Balls of Fire
description:
Remain king of the hill

Sit on your dome and resist to humans invasions

This game was made for the LevelUp game jam 2022 edition

Theme :  Dôme

Contrainte LevelUp :  Bruits à la bouche, Boids

Team (Pêche et Tradition) : Luc Francey, Quentin Meyer, Mike Cotton-Russell, Elio Ramel, David Dunand

Controls : A = rotate camera left | D =  rotate camera right | space = attack  | hold space = attack more

build 1001 published 20/02/2022 16:24 / Fix dragon death animation + white noise
